As of June 26, 2021, there is an attempt of a boycott underway for dead by daylight. for the next three months we are going to cease all sales, and stop buying everything BHVR related. This includes cosmetics, battlepasses, and the next chapter, as well as the game itself. BHVR has no competition and as a result has treated the health of the game very poorly and has mostly ignored the community for the past two years, with things getting worse and worse. If you are reading this, and want Dead by Daylight, please wait three months before you purchase it, and check to see if anything has changed.

With that being said, I do enjoy this game for the most part, but all dlc and cosmetic content costs real world money and are very overprice.
Paso mas en el piso que reparando (Y)
jogo maravilhoso pra descontrair, fazer amigos, dar risada e bem competitivo.

Played this back on PS4 version honestly a much bigger upgrade when compared to PC. I find this game to be both extremely  addicting but can get burned out easily, with that being said the community as a whole is cancer with entitled survivors complaining about killers and vice versa. Once you get past that I highly recommend giving it go especially when getting these licensed chapters it gets better and new events keep it interesting at times.

eu adorei demais o jogo incrivel os desenvolvedores trazerem seriais killer famosos pro jogo principalmente agora com o novo lançamento da nova dlc de resident evil que veio leon kennedy e jill valentine como sobreviventes e de assasino veio o nemesis, eu recomendo demais voces jogarem junte-se a nos nessa nevoa mas quem comanda e a entidade.

EDIT- Can we get a meh rating? I have to say I reccomend it now even though there still are a lots of problems still. The bloodweb nonesense is still an issue and the new matchmaking system is awful, I should not be in the same lobby as a baby killer, nor a damn top rank player, least not yet, but they have fixed a lot of the server side issues. Althou pallets are still pure jank.


I love this game, but I bought all the DLC and honestly regret that because of the state of this game. The bloodpoints system is not good for the game anymore. The people in the game are a wide swath including exceptionally toxic players, but that is not the issue. It is the grind. I have played plenty of jrpg, crpgs, mmos, etc, so I know what grind is, I played Warframe. 

There are 24 killers each with 3 perks each, each having 3 levels for a total of 9 picks on the bloodweb per killer. Each level in the bloodweb is only worth one perk, there are also a 12 basic perks that several are useful, but not most (looking at you Monstrous Shrine). That is 3 x 12 for 36 base perks. That is 252 levels, give or take, if you get lucky levels post-40 tend to get 2 perks per level. However when you hit 50 with a character you have to make a decision, Prestige, to unlock one third of a cosmetic and an incremental bump to rarity drop in the bloodweb, at the cost of everything you have unlocked to this point. IF you want the full collectible you have to do this twice more. 

Assuming you are sane and don't p3 (the above process) every character, you would still have to get every single killer to 250 to have all their perks, which I do not know the math on, but have been told it is in the millions of bloodpoints to do. I have made several hundred thousand bloodpoints. Honestly having multiple characters teachable perks, I am likely past several million. There are also 27 survivors and you level up killers and survivors with the same pool.

There is more, lots more. I love this game, but it is not god right now, do not waste your money until they fix it. I know I regret it.

The attempt of a boycott is currently underway for Dead by Daylight. For the next 3 months we are going to cease all sales, and stop buying everything BHVR releases. This includes cosmetics, rifts, and the next Chapter. BHVR has treated the health of the game poorly and ignored the community for the past 2 years, with it only getting worse and worse. If you are reading this and want DBD, wait for the next 3 months before you get it, and check in to see if anything has changed.
I have had a lot of fun playing as killer. For such a cheap price i'm getting lots of entertainment and fun out of it.

actually a trash game that only gets worse with every update. killer players are never satisfied (honestly understandable), survivor players are never satisfied and they still have to complain about EVERYTHING and be salty even when they win. imagine how they act when they lose.

when you try to be calm and nice in chat by saying things like "well played", "glhf next", "have a nice day" or other friendly things you just get attacked, and people (BOTH survivors and killers) want to be extremely toxic or start a fight for absolutely no reason because this game has THE MOST TOXIC COMMUNITY i have ever seen. it's crazy how so many people take this game very seriously.

everyone also always uses the same strong perks every game, which ofc is so much fun!! we love to see it!! 👍👍

if you want to play this game, make sure you have many therapy sessions booked in advance, put on a hazmat suit and be prepared for all toxicity unless you hate yourself at an extreme level or want a reason to hate yourself. 👍
Dont play if you a have a life and make you also can do repetitive actions over and over
